title: For Sale/Trade:  TRADE PENDING:    4th Gen Glock 17 with awesome Zev trigger
postcontent: If you're looking for a G17 with an amazing trigger, look no further. Here's an awesome 4th generation model 17. It has the Zev trigger installed (see http://zevtechnologies.com/search/index.ssp#/Trigger-Kits), which gives it a very light and crisp pull...smoothest, lightest trigger I've ever felt on a Glock...but too light for me...doesn't fit with my collection of unaltered, stock Glocks because I'm so used to an out-of-the-box trigger. As you can see from the pictures, it's immaculate. I am selling this gun in order to consolidate my collection to focus on Glock 19's, and I have over $600 in this G17, so I'm expecting to take a loss on this...but it simply doesn't fit into my collection anymore because the trigger is not like my other Glocks. I am available to meet most days along I-459 from Trussville to Hoover. Price is FIRM. I will sell ONLY to Alabama residents who are legally allowed to own this gun. Before I meet you, I will require a text or email of a photo of your carry permit so that I know who I'm meeting with and to know that you have passed a recent background check. I will do the same for you. For TRADES, I am interested in Glock 19's or Glock 26's that are out-of-the-box, with limited aftermarket enhancements.

postcontent: WOW! We have two Ruger Labels 50th Year Anniversary Engraved OU shotguns in both 28GA and 20GA new in the original box with all paperwork, chokes, grease and locks. Both are in the most sought after and hard to find 28GA and 20GA (model 04263 and 04063) and each are in new condition as if you bought it from the gun shop in 1999. When you pick it up the first thing you feel is how light it is and then when you place it in your shoulder, you will realize that this gun fits you perfect and is the perfect skeet or upland game bird shotgun. Model 04063 20GA Ruger Red Label 50th Anniversary 28” OU shotgun with 3” chambers. Like the 28GA, it is very beautiful and sports wonderful walnut wood stocks and forearms. It fits well when you place it in your shoulder and has a more power with the 20GA and 3” chambers versus the 28GA. This shotgun is absolutely beautiful and would be the center of attention in any collection, skeet range or bird field. We are offering both 28 and 20GA for $5200 or separate $3000 for 28GA and $2600 for 20GA. You will not be disappointed with these shotguns and if bought together, pretty much set for the rest of your life with two extraordinary shotguns.Shipping is $80 for both or $40 separate to your FFL.

postcontent:
I'm sure your math is off, so let me help you... you're buying a used Sig Sauer SP2022 9mm. It comes with 3 magazines, 15+1 if you carry with a round loaded. 525 rounds of 9mm ammunition, whereas if zombies, Democraps, or theivers (sometimes all the same thing), approach you, the 400 rounds of regular target ammo will do. Included is the 125 rounds of Hollow Point/Exploding Ammo. 

Also too, in addition to the extra magazine, is two holesters, one for open carry with extra slot for a mag, and other is a LH Neoprene, that I wore on my back (right hand user). I figured, if ninjas put their nun-chucks there, a handgun in the small of your back is the best place to carry. 

This is my 3rd carry gun and I've taken excellent care of it and am even throwing in a 9mm cleaning kit as part of the price. This is a very nice lot for a first time buyer. It is exceptional for a seasoned guy, but you know what you see. Any questions, ask.
